column4: Hi!  I installed the latest ffmpeg manually, because I needed GPL options (MPEG2).  Now, I want other programs that require ffmpeg to intall, but not to install ffmpeg.  With yum, you just add an exclusion for ffmpeg.  How do I do this with apt/synaptic?
To ask this with fewer words.  "-)
How do I make apt-get skip updates for a certain package?
